dc_title_s: Mineral Exploration Document Areas - Lehmann Family Fund Collection: Minnesota
dc_description_s: Spatial (GIS) footprints that connect to more than 2,000 scanned mineral exploration documents from the Lehmann Family Fund Collection (including the Polaris Joint Venture). The GIS polygon data includes URL links to view or download the document(s) for a mineral exploration area. Please read the lineage and accuracy sections of this form for details on GIS data creation and accuracy.   For information on the Lehmann Exploration Collection inventory please visit the DNR's webpage at: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/lands_minerals/polaris/index.html
dc_creator_sm: Minnesota Department of Natural Resources (DNR) - Lands and Minerals Division
